description: This app for the palm webOS contains 263 professionally written flash cards to hone your knowledge for the Certified Associate in Software Testing (CAST) certification exam.  *   Each flash card contains a key term or concept from the QAI CAST Common Body of Knowledge (CBOK), followed by a clear and concise explanation and definition.  ||  All of our app content is created exclusively for Upward Mobility by expert writers who have strong knowledge in the subject matter and all of our materials undergo a thorough review process.  ||  Our flash card app has simple, intuitive navigation, with the ability to shuffle cards, to remove flash cards from the deck, and to reset the deck.  *  Vocabulary Topics include Software Testing Principles and Concepts, the Test Environment, Test Planning and execution, Test Status, Analysis and Reporting, User Acceptance planning  ||  This app is the ideal on-the-go study aid for the busy IT professional!  ||  Upward Mobility creates high quality management education and test preparation material that is witty, engaging, and adds value in the learning process.  *   We are a double bottom line company committed to education in the developing world. Some of the profits will be used to deploy education via mobile phone in emerging countries.
